markdownRemark.html:
This is my second post about Dr. Peterson. If you want to see that short thank you blog and links to his amazing content, please check this post.

I had seen our family crash down, experienced the worst with how things can be and even did a project to help people in the fringes but eventually turned their back on me.. It is clear to me that there is no one size fit all but I always hitting walls wherein I could not understand reality itself.

As a child, I knew at the back of my head that there is something wrong with how the world operates but unfortunately, I can’t specifically point out what it is.

Enter Dr. Jordan B. Peterson..

If you have watched the movie Avengers: Infinity Wars where this scene wherein Thor came back to earth and threw his hammer to Thanos and then this villain said “You should have aimed for the head..” - Dr. Peterson quite got me on some level where he have hit the holes in my belief that resides in my head for the past decades.. some even when I was still a child.

There are voices that trust how God will direct me after a worst situation. Don’t do Evil. Even though I try to implement this over the track of my life, unfortunately it is rather difficult to not hurt people as we strive to exist as truthfully as possible. Truth hurts pretty bad.
